original_text: My friends, you should not think of ways to make me suffer even more. You say that I have caused my own trouble. My friends, you should not think of ways to make me suffer even more. You say that I have caused my own trouble. My friends, you should not think of ways to make me suffer even more. You say that I have caused my own trouble. My friends, you should not think of ways to make me suffer even more.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 이르기를 우리가 그를 어떻게 칠까 하며 또 이르기를 일의 뿌리가 그에게 있다 할진대

sentences.original_text: My friends, you should not think
sentences.korean_translation: 내 친구들아, 너희는 생각하지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: of ways to make me suffer even more
You say that I have caused my own trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 내 자신의 고통을 일으켰다고 말한다
